dict.acceptation: 使转动；旋转；使改变方向；使不适；
翻转；（路线或方向的）改变；机会；

sent.orig: Bank-To-Turn (BTT) and Skid-To-Turn (STT) control techniques are widely used in current missile control systems.
sent.trans: 现代导弹控制技术一般可分为侧滑转弯(Skid-to-Turn,STT)控制技术和倾斜转弯(Bank-to-Tum,BTT)控制技术。

sent.orig: TURN protocol is a technique for simple traversal of UDP through NAT.
sent.trans: TURN协议是一种穿越对称NAT的技术。

sent.orig: Bank-to-turn(BTT) technology is a novel control technology with great vitality. It has been deeply investigated abroad.
sent.trans: 倾斜转弯(Bank—to—Turn简称BTT)技术是一门新的控制技术，具有强大的生命力，国外已开始深入的研究。

sent.orig: Turn left, please. Turn right, please. Turn back, please. Turn around, please.
sent.trans: 请向左转。请向右转。请向后转。请转一圈。

sent.orig: Two fingers, two fingers turn turn turn, turn to a rabbit jump jump jump.
sent.trans: 俩只手指，两只手指变，变，变，变为一只小白兔跳，跳，跳。
